```{js, echo=FALSE}
function unhide() {
    var hid = document.getElementsByClassName("exp");
    // Emulates jQuery $(element).is(':hidden');
    if(hid[0].offsetWidth > 0 && hid[0].offsetHeight > 0) {
        hid[0].style.visibility = "visible";
    }
}
```

```{css, echo=FALSE}
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Sanchez:ital@0;1&display=swap');

html *{
  font-family: "Sanchez", serif;
}

body {
  background: rgb(150, 169, 190);
background: linear-gradient(117deg, rgba(196,224,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 30%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 70%, rgba(255,197,231,1) 100%);
}

.content {
  margin-top: 10em;
  border-radius: 59px;
background: #fbfbfb;
box-shadow:  30px 30px 52px rgba(196,224,255,0.2),
             -30px -30px 52px rgba(255,197,231,0.5);
}

.exp {
  visibility: hidden;
}

h1 {
  font-size: 60px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

h3 {
    font-size: 16px;
}

.box {
  padding-top: 30px;
  padding-bottom: 15px;
}

.button {
  border-radius: 5px;
background: #ffffff;
box-shadow:  7px 7px 15px #d9d9d9,
             -7px -7px 15px #ffffff;
  border: unset;
  height: 3em;
  width: 5em;
}

.header {
  margin-top:50px;
}

#search-field {
  width: 500px;
  height: 3em;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 1em;
  background-color: #fcfcfc;
  box-shadow: inset 2px 5px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  transition: 300ms ease-in-out;
}

#search-field:focus {
  background-color: white;
  transform: scale(1.01);
  box-shadow: 13px 13px 100px #969696,
             -13px -13px 100px #ffffff;
}

#search-field::placeholder {
   text-align: center; 
}

a {
  color: rgb(28, 88, 157);
}

a:hover {
  text-decoration:none;
}

.footer {
  position: absolute;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  padding: 1rem;
  text-align: center;
}
```
